Html:
Kindly refer to the directions on page 99-100 of pdf When I try to create a ShoppingCartIndex by Right clicking in the Shopping Cart Controller under Index method and strongly typing to ShopppingCartViewModel, I fail because ShopppingCartViewModel is not there in the list of Model classes. Though, I had already created a folder “ModelView” and put two classes in it: (1) ShopingCartViewModel and (2) ShoppingCartRemoveViewModel.
Please Help!
Thank you.
